pages.title: Twilight Forest
pages.text: The Twilight Forest is a dimension with a dense twilit forest themed by real world mythology. adds many new blocks, mobs and mechanics.$(br2)$(l:http://benimatic.com/tfwiki/index.php?title=Main_Page)Twilight Forest Wiki$(/l)$(br2)Note: The portal can be created with any flower that's placable on grass.

pages.name: Twilight Portal
pages.text: Throw a diamond into the water to activate the portal.
